required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Evaluation of ET-01 Transplantation in Subjects With Transfusion Dependent β-Thalassaemia
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Site, Open Label Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of ET-01 Transplantation in Subjects With Transfusion Dependent β-Thalassemia

lead_sponsor.agency: Institute of Hematology & Blood Diseases Hospital

clinical_study.source: Institute of Hematology & Blood Diseases Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open label, single site study to evaluate the safety and Efficacy of ET-01 Transplantation in subjects with Transfusion Dependent β-Thalassaemia.

detailed_description.textblock: After proper subject is recruited, subject will go through steps generally as stem cell mobilization, apheresis, conditioning and ET-01 infusion to complete therapy. 2 years' follow up visits will be carried out post-transplantation and related data will be collected.

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency and severity of AEs & SAEs identified according to NCI CTCAE 5.0.
primary_outcome.time_frame: from ET-01 infusion to 104 weeks post-transplant

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of abnormal laboratory test results after transplant
primary_outcome.time_frame: from ET-01 infusion to 104 weeks post-transplant

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of abnormal vital signs after transplant
primary_outcome.time_frame: from ET-01 infusion to 104 weeks post-transplant

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of clinical significant abnormal vital signs.
primary_outcome.time_frame: from ET-01 infusion to 60mins after ET-01 infusion

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with clinical significant abnormal vital signs.
primary_outcome.time_frame: from ET-01 infusion to 60mins after ET-01 infusion

secondary_outcome.description: neutrophil count [ANC] >500 /mm3 for 3 consecutive days or platelet count [PLT] >20000/mm3 for 7 consecutive days

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in total hemoglobin from baseline.
Change in frequency of packed RBC transfusions.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from 6 months before recruitment to 104 weeks post-transplant

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in volume of packed RBC transfusions.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from 6 months before recruitment to 104 weeks post-transplant

arm_group.description: BCL11A Enhancer modified Autologous Hematopoietic Stem Cells.

intervention.description: Recruited participants will receive ET-01 IV infusion after conditioning.

overall_official.affiliation: Institute of Hematology & Blood Diseases Hospital

facility.name: Institute of Hematology & Blood Diseases Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Institute of Hematology & Blood Diseases Hospital
responsible_party.investigator_title: Director of Regenerative Medicine Clinic Center
